list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the unbroken and consistent existence or operation of something over a period of time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: pension rights accruing through continuity of employment
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: quyền lương hưu tích lũy thông qua tính liên tục của việc làm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the maintenance of continuous action and self-consistent detail in the various scenes of a movie or broadcast.
